trend_summary: Imagery shows 2000-2022 evolution of a medium-density city. Built form stays compact; most growth is eastward where fields convert to logistics warehouses. Central grid gains scattered infill and larger rooftops. Green belts along river and hills thicken, and arterial roads are widened, but little new housing sprawl occurs.
notable_changes: Large white-roof warehouses added on the eastern fringe, replacing farmland.
Incremental infill and roof enlargements within the central street grid.
Expansion and resurfacing of main arterial roads, especially eastâ€“west links.
Denser tree cover along river corridor and hillside parks.
